### Markdown text:

I like **Alan Embree** but not **Chad Bradford** (it is not g [i.e. it's not o]). i _mean_ it is not ok.

### URLs and char sequences:

Lol. Convenience,” says @Wharton's @barbarakahn.http://knlg.net/2BkEXm2

### Stop words, stemming, lemmatizing and tokenization:

Mr. Smith and Dr. in USA what? U.S.A. with dr. Mac!!! Neymar Jr., is Neymar Jr.. Or is Neymar Jr.
This. is a strange! Sentence to tokenize? is'nt it ? Hahaaaa;you're right_.
These sentences are here to test stop words. Particularly when you want to I'm nor didn't knows come anymore. I'll Bob' things you've not awesome? Available RE I test RE: ok. Take off your things and don't myself. He hasnt hasn' t hasn't hasn 't do it properly by me on the only their pretty things of Mr. D.
Can you lematize cats and dogs likely fairing till' I accepted it? Of course.I'm not ok.
Google Inc., 20 West Kinzie, Chicago IL USA 60610


### All emojis special cases:

:-) These are emojis;) and =) :/ these are not:- I am. -You are. Test:-3 look. These are -_-: but not this one: ^a good.
😖	😣	😀	ӽ	🙍	¤	¯\_(ツ)_/¯	. Here special cases emoji 👨 :man: :smile: :relaxed: U+1F600 😅 😅
D‑': 	D:< 	D: 	D8 	D; 	D= 	DX :‑P :P 	X‑P XP 	x‑p xp 	:‑p :p 	:‑Þ :Þ 	:‑þ :þ 	:‑b :b 	d: 	=p 	>:P emojis
Emojis :‑) :) 	:-]:] 	:-3 :3 	:-> :> 	8-) 8) 	:-} :} 	:o) 	:c) 	:^)
	=] 	=) 😄  💗 😇 😱 🙅 😤 👋 🌹 🎅 😴 💤 🚬 🎧 🐍 \xF0\x9F\x98\x8C U+1F60C \U+1F60C . All are emojis!
Here I repeat the emoji  :) :) :) a :) :-) :-) a :-)
These emojis has chars to be escaped in a regex: :/ :$ :* %) :[ *) . \xF0\x9F\x98\x81 \xE2\x9C\x82 ✂ ✂ \xF0\x9F\x9A\x9A 🚚 🌍 we need to test the utf-8 emoji recognition AND the emoji normalization




### Here all multi line texts:


----------------

I'm a story
Which has no punct
And can you tokenize me?
I think yes


But with a lot of blank space ? 		
Maybe ; yes. And did you mean I do it? No you don't.
